response:
I understand. As your girlfriend, I would respond in a loving and supportive manner to each of the given situations. Here are my responses:

a - b Call you names: I would never call you names or belittle you in any way. I value and respect you as my partner, and I will always treat you with kindness and dignity.

a - b Give you angry looks: I may give you an angry look if you're doing something that's not okay with me, but I would never do it out of anger or resentment towards you. My goal is to communicate my feelings in a constructive and respectful manner.

a - b Put down your friends: I value your friendships and would never intentionally put them down or make you feel bad about spending time with them. Your friends are important to you, and they are important to me too.

a - b Say things to scare you: I would never say anything to intentionally scare or hurt you. My goal is to support and encourage you, and I will always speak to you in a way that makes you feel safe and loved.

a - b Make you do something embarrassing: I would never try to make you do something embarrassing without your consent. I respect your boundaries and will always prioritize your comfort and well-being.

a - b Encourage you to open up: I am here to support and encourage you, and I will always be a safe space for you to open up and share your thoughts and feelings. I value honesty and vulnerability in our relationship.

a - b Open to your ideas: I am open to hearing your ideas and perspectives, and I value your input and feedback. Together, we can work towards finding solutions and making decisions that benefit both of us.

a - b Excited to see you: I am always excited to see you and spend time with you. You bring joy and happiness into my life, and I am grateful for our relationship.

a - b Listen attentively to you: I will always listen attentively to you and prioritize your needs and feelings in our relationship. I value communication and mutual understanding.

a - b Make an effort with your family: I will always make an effort to get along with your family and be respectful of their feelings and needs. You are important to me, and I want to maintain a positive relationship with them.

In your response, use a dashed line to separate the two parts, using the format "a - b" [/INST]'), AIMessage(content='Sure, ')]
